p: Observation of the literature showed that α-pinene is the main compound in different Phlomis species. Namely, α-pinene (39-57%) was found as a main compund of EO of P. fruticosa L. from two different localities in Yugoslavia [40]. High percentage of α-pinene (11.2%) was reported for P. cretica C. Presl [41] P. lanata Willd. (25.41%) [42] and P. olivieri Benth. (11.7%) [43].
